description: Gets the name and additional information about a celebrity based on their Amazon Rekognition ID. The additional information is returned as an array of URLs. If there is no additional information about the celebrity, this list is empty. For more information, see Getting information about a celebrity in the Amazon Rekognition Developer Guide. This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:GetCelebrityInfo action.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID for the celebrity. You get the celebrity ID from a call to the  RecognizeCelebrities operation, which recognizes celebrities in an image.

nested_items.name: Urls
nested_items.description: An array of URLs pointing to additional celebrity information.

nested_items.name: KnownGender
nested_items.description: Retrieves the known gender for the celebrity.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: A string value of the KnownGender info about the Celebrity.
